website_summaries.verdict: Contains B complex vitamins in a gluten- and soy-free once-daily capsule.
pros: Contains all B vitamins as well as folate and biotin
Only needs to be taken once daily
Can aid in weight loss and maintaining energy levels
cons: Several people noted having what they thought was an allergic reaction to the supplement, though "niacin flush" - a rashy face with warm and flushed skin - is a common reaction when taking large amounts of vitamin B3

customer_reviews.title: Doctor's Best Fully Active B Complex  are a very good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Best uses a highly advanced form of Folate.... Quatrefolic. There are presently Four Generations of Folate. Each new generation is more active than those before it. More bio-available. Quatrefolic is 4th Generation. Best also uses the superior and safer form of B12--- Methylcobalamin.
customer_reviews.author: BUTCHO

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Having a very bad allergic reaction to this! Skin is burning and all red. Took some activated charcoal to rid myself of this ! Took 6 different supplements the other day and the same thing happened. Didn’t know which one it was until now when I only took this supplement by itself. I have used this brand in the past so not sure why this is happening now.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Easy swallow, easily absorbed
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these are vegan. They're very light and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dr recommended
customer_reviews.text: Reccomended by my Dr for anemia. Helps keep my blood count up and helps with the fatigue, price is reasonable compared with local health stores and these are delivered to my home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Good supplements
customer_reviews.text: May be it’s a good supplement but I stopped to buy it. But anyway I can tell I think this supplements are good but everyone is looking for something the best for himself. So me too.
customer_reviews.author: Lana and Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product more energy and not as irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was having “burning feet” sensation on the bottom of my soles. Knowing it was most likely b vitamin deficiency, purchased Dr Best. After taking 2 doses, no more burning feet.
customer_reviews.author: thomas smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is like any other vitamin. Makes me want to gag. Hold your breath but will get the job done I take this with my Folate for my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenate my energy!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it a B Complex vitamin we all need especially when we get older. Supports energy and it's vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Fully Active Bs!
customer_reviews.text: Due to some genetic mutations (SNPs) I need to take my Bs in an 'active' form. Doctor's Best is one of the few companies that actually makes a 'fully active' B-Complex – AND makes it affordable! These have become a mainstay in my supp routine.
customer_reviews.author: indigo

customer_reviews.title: Eating healthy is important for optimal health.
customer_reviews.text: I use the supplement because I eat more vegetarian/vegan and want to ensure that I get enough B vitamins. I swallow capsule, don’t taste and trust that it’s absorbed by the body.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality B complex at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. Vegan, easy to swallow slim capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Skiba

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand of supplements
customer_reviews.text: I get this burst of energy when I take these vitamins or any supplements made buy this brand I will always buy and trust in this brand of supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Aj763

customer_reviews.title: They improve my energy
customer_reviews.text: My energy does improve when I take these. It makes quite a difference. I can’t function without them.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best products
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I feel the results from theses supplements but I still like all of Doctor’s Best products. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I use B vitamins to control anxiety. I feel this brand works better than any I’ve tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good but...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best currently but still room for improvement... leave the Magnesium Stearate and Silicon and lower the price, then it will be top of the list..
customer_reviews.author: Rowen di Bowen

product_meta.title: Doctor's Best Fully Active B Complex, Supports Energy, Nervous System, Optimal Health, Positive Mood & Well-Being, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Vegan, Soy Free
product_meta.description: Doctor's Best Fully Active B Complex provides energy and helps coping with stress.
feature_bullets: FULLY ACTIVE B COMPLEX - contains all eight important B vitamins - full spectrum designed for optimal absorption and utilization to support overall health and well-being. Water-soluble B vitamins play important roles in cell metabolism, supporting DNA, organs, genes, cells, tissues, skin health, immune system, enzyme functions and energy production.*

CONTAINS QUATREFOLIC – is the glucosamine salt of (6S)-5-methyltetrahydrofolate, the most bioavailable form of folate, that provides greater stability and water solubility.* Folate is an essential vitamin to support DNA, proper cell division, cardiovascular, mental and emotional well-being.*
IMPORTANCE OF VITAMIN B - B vitamins provide energy and promotes a positive mood.* Helps support healthy brain, heart, circulation, immunity and promotes optimal health and well-being.*
ENERGY SUPPORT - provides B vitamins that work together to convert food into energy. Helps support proper metabolism of carbohydrates, fat, and protein.*

NERVOUS SYSTEM SUPPORT - helps support nerve function.* Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine HCl and pyridoxal 5’ phosphate) supports a healthy nervous system. Vitamin B6 is vital for early brain development and for the metabolism of various brain chemical transmitters. Nerve cells both in the brain and elsewhere in the body rely on Vitamin B6.*

CLINICAL RESEARCH – shows that B vitamins are important for DNA and protein synthesis and therefore healthy cell growth and development.* This full spectrum supplement is fully optimized for safety and efficacy and is an excellent way to ensure that the body’s needs for B vitamins are being satisfied.
